column4: if you want to know which ubuntu you are running you are running 6th month 06 year release

for me its install, install packages, done
i don't really understand what is there to configure

in the end i completely dropped windows

oh okay ... so uninstall nvidia drivers next , then do sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg and select vesa for your drivers.  that will get you an x session and you can go from there
